Html:
Hi.

I have an issue using getValue from cell.

I have a sheet with a filled cell with long text (1110 chars on length).

using getValue() it returns me null value.

I'm using PHPExcel 1.7.9

thnx

EDIT

in other excel files with similar cell text lenght characters the value are truncated to 255 chars.

checking the XLS file, I've found it's a merged cell, so searching I found it: http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/discussions/73891

following that function for mergin cells only it returns me a number 1. the secon one file what truncate text length to 255 chars now doesn't returns me anything.
